title: Small Dab Stew
content:
Small Dab Stew is an item that can be obtained from cooking it in Boiling Pot in The Delectable Dab Kitchen.

It is a type of Dab Stew and rewards 8 xp per action. It is used in the Passive activities for the Chef profession.

Around 1.8 Small Dab are consumed per hour of passive activity.
